title: Ginger Lemonade
directions: Place the ginger in a food processor or blender. Add lemon juice and process until smooth.
Add water and maple syrup. Mix well.
Serve in glasses filled with ice.
ingredients: 1 piece of 10 cm (70g) of ginger peeled and chopped
1 cup (250ml) of lemon juice (about 3 to 4 lemons)
2 lemons cut into slices for garnish
